means: [史]伊比利亚半岛，（第一次世界大战中指）加利波利半岛
（第一次世界大战中指）加利波利半岛

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都可表示"岛"之意。
means: island ： 普通用词，指一般的岛屿，即海里被水环绕、面积比大陆小的陆地，或河、湖中被水环绕的陆地。
peninsula ： 指三面临水一面连接大陆地，即半岛。

sentence.Network_en: The boat was anchored off the northern coast of the peninsula.
sentence.Network_cn: 这艘船停泊在离该半岛北部海岸不远的地方。

sentence.Network_en: Quiberon is set on an eight-mile peninsula.
sentence.Network_cn: 基伯龙位于一个8英里大小的半岛上。

sentence.Network_en: All the attractions of the peninsula beckon.
sentence.Network_cn: 半岛上的各处景点无不令人心驰神往。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin paeninsula, from paene 'almost' + insula 'island'

entry.def: A peninsula is a long narrow piece of land which sticks out from a larger piece of land and is almost completely surrounded by water.

example.ex: ...the political situation in the Korean peninsula...
I had walked around the entire peninsula.

means.word_mean: 1. a large mass of land projecting into a body of water

stems_affixes.word_buile: pen近似,差不多+ultimate最终→靠近最终一个→倒数第二
pen近似,差不多+insula岛→似岛一样→半岛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 半明半暗之处,边缘部分
stems_affixes.word_buile: pen近似,差不多+umbra影子→靠近影子→半影
insul岛屿,sul有'单独'之意+ar……的→adj.岛屿的,心胸狭窄的
insul岛屿,sul有'单独'之意+in表示"……素"→n.胰岛素

stems_affixes.value_cn: 隔离,孤立;使绝缘,使绝热
stems_affixes.word_buile: insul岛屿,sul有'单独'之意+ate表动词→变成岛的状态→隔离
